attributes.action: Approved time off work for blood & platelet donations. Help save more lives.
attributes.additional_details: To get employers to allow approved time away from work to be able to donate blood or platelets. Only 4% of people who can give blood actually do. This could be due to having to use their own time either days off, nights or weekends. This would help save more lives if people can get approved time away from their work place to donate!.
